boardgame.description: As the head of an ambitious Venetian family in Intrigo (a.k.a. Masques) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; which won the 2009 Concours de cr_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;eacute;ateurs under the title St Beno_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;icirc;t _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; you have sent your most influential representatives to mingle at the Doge's masquerade ball. By cleverly positioning these guests (and by manipulating the guests of your opponents), you'll vie for the attention of Venice's elite guild masters, ensuring the most political power for your family._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Gameplay revolves chiefly around the clever use of guest cards with varying levels of influence. Each player receives a hand of guest cards, and each guest card has an influence value and its own power, e.g., the peddler, the assasin and the gondolier. The higher the influence, the greater that guest's clout at court. Each player's hand consists of a mix of cards representing members of any of the families currently in play. Use a rival family's guest cards against them, and watch for chances to set up your own house for success._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each of the rooms of the Doge's palace offer tokens representing a guild's favor or valuable ducats to be won by ambitious nobles. The spaces between each card that represents a room in the palace are the hallways of the Doge's estate _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the areas in which guest cards are placed to compete for adjacent resources._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 91- The Manhattan Project: Energy Empire

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

listing.notes: Greek rules included.

Asmodée (ASM INT01US) Plotting on the canals! Strengthen the alliances which allow you to become the new Doge of Venice! Each player receives a Family card tied to a color of Plot card. The game board is then made up by placing Arcade cards in a square shape at the center of the table. On each Arcade card a Ducat or Seal token is placed. A turn takes place over three phases. In the first phase, each player receives 4 Plot cards, keeps one and hands the remaining 3 to the next player, who will keep one and hand the rest to the next player and so on, until all players have 4 cards in hand. During the second phase, the players can place a Plot or Influence card (bought with Ducats) between Arcade cards. Influence cards allow the elimination or the switching of Plot cards, etc. Once all the spaces between Arcade cards are filled, the players get the Ducats and Seals they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve won using their Plot cards. When everything_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s been claimed, all the Plot cards are removed from the board, tokens are placed on the Arcade cards again and a new trun begins! The first player to gain 5 different Seals or 4 identical ones wins the game.
Open but unplayed.

Reserved for Shelia Bainbridge Intrigo, 2010, by Hazgaard. Played once. Amazing graphics. Clean, undamaged, complete, bagged _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; banded.

The game: Hazgaard (c) 2010. English, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Greek rules included! All game parts are punched but still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
